Class RESTController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jackstockley.addressbookrest.RESTController

  • @Path(value="connect")
public class RESTController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles making the connection between the RESTfull web service and the MySQL server

public javax.ws.rs.core.Response setUpConnection(@PathParam(value="server")
